overview.en: Lottonation (LNT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Lottonation has a current supply of 400,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Lottonation is 0.04444548 USD and is down -5.32 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $26,660.81 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.lottonation.com/.
